SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package controllers

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class MainScreenController extends Object implements Controller
Controller class for the main screen of the dice game application. This screen includes elements like the player's name, balance, settings, and buttons to navigate to different scenes.

      public void removeEventHandlers()
